storyInfo: Lyudmila stays at the Truckers' Union, slowly becoming a part of the truckers' lives. On the night of the car crash, Sommer avoids the other drivers to go out on a drive of his own. Sensing something amiss, Lyudmila sits herself down on his passenger seat.

attributes.content: What's going on here, Sommer?
I dunno either! I was just driving my truck when the engine blew a gasket, then I noticed this kid lying down by the road. Scared the hell out of me! Thought I hit her.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: She fainted out in the wilds on her lonesome, kept saying she was looking for someone in a red hoodie.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I couldn't just leave her out there, so I brought her back here...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Looking for me? I've got no idea who she is, though.
Seems like an unlucky loner to me. Think we can let her stay in our camp? Considering how busy we've been lately, having another pair of hands would be nice.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You know every member of the association has to go through a strict background check, Sommer.
An Infecte—person of unknown origin like her... What if she has something to do with the famiglie?
*sigh*...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The doctor said her condition's stable, so once she's up, send her on her way.
A-Alright then.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: This ragazza sfortunata sure is holding that knife of hers real tight. Someone might get hurt. Let's get that off her—
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't touch me!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You're awake.
attributes.name: Woman Wearing A Red Hoodie

attributes.content: You—!
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Lyudmila looks at the woman standing in front of her, and gives her bleary eyes a good knead or two.
Sorry... Where am I?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Nuova Volsinii's Truckers' Union.
attributes.name: Woman Wearing A Red Hoodie

attributes.content: Oh, so you saved me... Thanks.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Don't mention it. Our members aren't the type to leave an unconscious girl to fend for herself in the wilds. But now that you're awake, we can't help you much further than that.
attributes.name: Woman Wearing A Red Hoodie

attributes.content: We'll give you something to eat, but you'll have to go after you're done. See her fed, Sommer.
attributes.name: Woman Wearing A Red Hoodie

attributes.content: Thanks for the help. I'll be going, then.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: No need to rush, youngster.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I wanted to ask you something, just to be safe... You're not with a famiglia, are you?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: ...It's been many, many years since I last heard that word.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Figured. You don't look like the sort who would have anything to do with them.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't worry about it too much, Eirene's just real worried about wise guys getting their claws into the association. She's got a lot on her mind, so it's not like she has it out for you specifically.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: She was the one who paid for the doctor to give you a checkup when I brought you back here, even.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Thanks. I get it, I'm not going to cause you guys trouble.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I just need some time to think... about what I should do next.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Know how to drive?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: I've driven a truck in Ursus. Does that count?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: A quiet whisper, and at the same time, an equally-gentle caress.
Like leaves gently falling on grass, the wind that reaches the leeward slopes of the wilds is free of danger.
Once, surrounded by whispers and caresses like this, she slept. She grew.
On Rhodes Island, none dared treat her this way. None could treat her this way, not even Kal'tsit.
...Grandma?!
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Can't you see clearly anymore, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Like I told you before, my eyes were devoured by wolves. These glasses are just for show.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Only once their eyes are gouged out and placed back into Grandma's sockets can I see you again, Red.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Can't you give me a hug, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: My arms were swallowed whole by wolves. You must chop off their limbs and bring them to Grandma so I can hug you again.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Can't you teach me how to sing again, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I do wish to continue teaching you, but the wolves are always howling, and I dare not startle them.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Why did you take so long to find me, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: There are simply too many wolves, Red. They are hiding themselves along the side of the road. You must cut off their hides and make Grandma some clothes with them.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Are you really going to disappear, Grandma?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: That depends on if you can help Grandma, my sweet child.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I... I found a wolf in Lungmen, a fake one. But she had the smell of a true wolf on her.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I haven't found anything new since then...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Well, actually, I haven't been looking, Grandma.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Oh, I don't blame you, Red. You're the most well-behaved, kindest child in all the land.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I'm not. I passed out on my first wolf hunt. I was too weak. Kal'tsit found me in the grass and saved me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: When I was with her, she told me about a lot of things I didn't know about.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: What is 'protection'? What is 'murder'? What is 'suffering'? What is 'happiness'? What can I learn? What can I do?
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: There's a lot of questions, and they're all really hard. I don't get them.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: 'Suffering'? 'Happiness'?
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: It's all because I didn't take good care of you. On the contrary, it's me who needs your help...
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: If you are unhappy, child, you can stay on Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: I don't have much time left. You can forget Grandma, forget your life as a wolf hunter...
attributes.name: Grandma

attributes.content: Red opens her eyes.
The windows and door to her room are shut tight. Not even a wisp of wind can find its way inside.
This is the third time this night she has awoken to the same dream.
Grandma needs me...
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: (Wiggles ears forcefully)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I promised Kal'tsit. If I want to leave Rhodes Island, I need to tell her.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: But Kal'tsit's not here. She went to a place called Tremons or something. A city far, far away.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I should wait—No, I can't wait. Grandma can't wait.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: (Sniffs in alarm)
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: I smell a wolf.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Not many true wolves left. They're here.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: Hurting Grandma is just a 'game' to them.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: And the rules of my game says I should kill them.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: ...Grandma is still waiting for me.
attributes.name: Projekt Red

attributes.content: <p=2>November 5th, 1100    3:17 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: 'For this extraordinary night, I sharpen my claws!'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant A

attributes.content: 'For a swift hunt, I bare my fangs!'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant B

attributes.content: 'For unrestrained festivities, I fight to the very last!'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant A

attributes.content: 'Only when the last one of us stands can the game reach its end!'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant B

attributes.content: 'Why are we this way?'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant A

attributes.content: 'Because we are wolves!'
attributes.name: Carnevale Participant A & B

attributes.content: The acting is pretty meh, but it's always nice to support street art! Check out these lights, n' the decor! And those tunes—
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor? What are you doing here?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Hey, you here too, ain't you, wolf pup?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: A party like this needs a genius artist like me! No shit I'm here!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Take a good look, Agnese, these kids know a party way better than you.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Did you come here for the party or for Agnese?
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Agnese might've taught you a lot, kid, but did she never tell you a party's a good place to see old friends?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Emperor here with that hyper-killer stare♪ Friends list full at one hundred no matter where♪ ...Grab a gun, shoot you dead, he don't care♪ Whad'dya think?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: You're just singing random words...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Improvisation! It's called improv, girl! Agnese, don't tell me you didn't teach your kid what kinda music the people crave!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Don't bad-mouth her! Agnese's amazing, she taught me way nicer songs than yours!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Oh yeah? What else does she teach you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Lots of things! How to light a fire, how to find places to sleep, how to hold a bow, how to use a knife, how to hunt and how to bleed my prey afterwards!
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Yeesh, what's with all the fightin' and killin'...?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: She also taught me about which way the wind blows, what flowers smell like, how to talk to tuskbeasts.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: She taught me how to talk to humans, and how to live with them.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Y'know, you might just have the gift of the gab there, unlike that red one. She says half a word n' folks is already on edge.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Agnese also told me that the humans' carnival is lots of fun, and how I can be happy and free in the city, just like out in the wilds...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Sounds like she taught you a lot. You lucky. The other Fangs don't got a chance to learn all that.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: The other Fangs...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I met the rest of the pack n' their Fangs. You listen to one word coming out they mouths n' you lose it.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: *sigh* Tell you the truth, Agnese, if it wasn't for all this urgent business, I wouldn't wanna have nothin' to do with you 'Signori dei Lupi' or whatever you call yourselves.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: I know, I know, that wolf pack's a bunch of stubborn, savage losers, but there ain't no gettin' out of this family reunion for the two of you.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Agnese's family...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: 'My will is not enough to avert the entire pack's gaze...' The hell you talkin' about, Agnese? What happened to all that 'breaking free from this road' n' 'starting a new life'?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: 'The game is the collective decision of the pack. Before it ends, we cannot be distracted by other matters. This is our nature...' Why're we back at that boring-ass game of yours?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: 'To go against our nature is an endless climb...' Talk about a pain in the ass! Seriously, I don't wanna talk to y'all ever again. I try n' have a normal conversation, but you always gotta bring it back to 'nature' or whatever.
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Agnese said 'this game must have a winner'.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: You dumbass mangy mutt, I take back everything good I ever said about you!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Forget it. You taught this kid so much about the outside world. Don't tell me you still thinkin' about sendin' her into a deathmatch with the other Fangs? You didn't ask me to get her to Rhodes Island just so she could die today, did you?
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: If you so worried about keepin' her safe, then get her ass back to Rhodes already. Sheesh, y'all keep runnin' around for no good reason!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: Rhodes Island...
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: Whoa! When the hell did these tuskbeasts come? Who're you tryna scare, flashin' your grills like that?!
attributes.name: Emperor

attributes.content: They're scared. They can smell the Fangs.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: I smell them too.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: The wolves are here.
attributes.name: Lunacub

attributes.content: <p=2>November 5th, 1100    4:05 P.M.</>
attributes.name: group_location_stamp

attributes.content: Hey, what the—! What's the big idea, shoving that freezing can of salt soda in my face?! Scared the crap outta me!
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: You get way too into Lyudmila's stories.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: So, what happened next?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: This Talulah lady, did Crownslayer manage to kill her in the end?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: No. Crownslayer didn't kill her.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Shame. Imagine staying by Talulah's side the entire time but never realizing your so-called leader was an evil dragon spewing lies... A lot of lives could've been saved.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Say, if this Crownslayer didn't kill Talulah or the Emperor of Ursus, why take that name?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Easy for you to say. We're talking about an emperor and an evil dragon here. You ever killed anyone, Romi?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Wait, you couldn't have, could you? I mean, when you worked for the Borgias...
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: I've never done any of the sort.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: I was just their night driver. They're not gonna ask a guy like me to kill someone.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Considering how crappy your driving is, would the dons really have picked you to drive them around at night?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Night driving... This some sort of famiglia lingo I don't know?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: It means exactly what it sounds like, driving at night! You're talking like a police officer! I'm tellin' ya, it's all in the past now.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Now that you mention it, Romi, you've been getting more tickets than usual lately.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: It's Carnevale. The whole city's packed full of both people and cars. You know that, man.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: And just so you know, I used to drive around a nomadic city full of ruins while trying to hide from a Catastrophe!
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Still stuck in one of Lyudmila's stories, huh?
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Speaking of, those stories are just ones you heard while in Ursus, right? You go into so much detail, it's almost like they were actually about you...
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Look at you guys, drinking the soda she bought you, listening to her stories, and now bothering her with questions. Didn't your mom ever teach you manners?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Got me there, Sommer. Sorry, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: It's fine.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: You know you don't need to treat us every week, right?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: How long has it been since you came to our camp? Three months? Four?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Not too sure myself, but it's been a while now.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: We pay you a wage, but you always end up giving it all back to us. Why not listen to my advice, save some for the future so you can start a business?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: You've all got families to feed. Me? I'm flying solo. Don't have anything else to spend that money on anyway. Besides, I'm one ragazza sfortunata. Even if I save it all, it's likely to sprout wings and fly away.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Oh, don't be like that...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Look, it's just two crates of salt soda.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I actually wanted to treat you guys to some beer for the weekend.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: But since you guys will be busy with that film shoot at Court Square tonight, you'll just have to make do with soda.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: If you're still thirsty, feel free to take more.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: I'll have a couple more, then!
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Here. Not gonna try one yourself, considering you're the one that bought them?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Oh, didn't realize you haven't had one yet...
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Just how many bottles are you trying to have, man?!
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: Alright, I'm sorry, I'm sorry!
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: ...I'm good.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Look, everyone knows, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Though I wouldn't say we don't completely mind. To tell you the truth, when I took off your mask... It scared the hell out of me.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: We just understand that... as an Infected, you're probably more worried than us about it spreading around.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't blame Romi and the others for pestering you with questions. They don't mean anything bad about it. They just want to get to know you a little better.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Don't be a stranger, Lyudmila.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: The setting sun dyes the grass of the camp and the drivers' faces a deep red. Sommer leans against the back of his truck, stretching his hand out to her. The other drivers look at her, nary a hint of wariness on their smiling faces.
Can you get drunk off salt soda? The Reproba wonders as she furrows her brow.
After a short moment of silence, she lowers her mask and takes the proffered bottled of soda from him.
Alright, it's nearly showtime. Time to pack things up and drive over to Court Square.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Eirene was real clear about how strict the filming schedule is, even stricter than our dispatch timetables. We can't be late, or we'll be causing City Hall a whole lot of trouble.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: What about Eirene herself?
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Said she wanted to go talk with Judge Lavinia about qualification audits for new drivers.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Oh yeah, Sommer, you're really not coming along?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: It's easy, you just need to drive your truck and follow along, make a big scene. City Hall's even paying us more than a day's wage to do it.
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: I-I've been driving a little too much lately. Now that I've finally got some spare time, I wanted to catch up on some Zs.
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: How 'bout you, Lyudmila?
attributes.name: Truck Driver B

attributes.content: I've got something to take care of, so I'll be hanging back too.
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Suit yourself. We'll be off then.
attributes.name: Truck Driver A

attributes.content: *phew* Finally...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Once the convoy of trucks has left and night slowly washes over the camp, Sommer, all on his lonesome, goes to his own truck.
He starts the engine, but before he even closed the door, a figure was already sat in the passenger seat, seat belt fastened and all.
L-Lyudmila...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: Thought you were going to catch some Zs?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Not much of a night drive with an empty passenger seat, yeah?
attributes.name: Lyudmila

attributes.content: Lyudmila, I really...
attributes.name: Sommer

attributes.content: What was it you said again? Don't be a stranger, Sommer.
attributes.name: Lyudmila
